summary: This mod adds some of the colorful weapons and armors of the short fantasy movie DESPAIR to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZhiFJmVoc4][img]http://bramknol.com/content/DESPAIR%20movie%20project/secret1/despairSmallPoster2.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod adds some of the colorful armors and weapons of the short fantasy movie DESPAIR to Skyrim.

My aim is to recreate the two full armor sets of DESPAIRs main characters, currently only the Imperial Generals armor (male only), shield and hammer are included.

[size=4]
Please help me by watching DESPAIR and the making of DESPAIR and subscribing to me on youtube: [/size][size=5]

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZhiFJmVoc4]DESPAIR short fantasy movie on youtube[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k-AT9EAhdcE]DESPAIR making of[/url]
[url=http://bramknol.com/]My website and portfolio[/url]

[/size]
The weapons and armors can be found in a chest located on the Great Porch of Dragonsreach (look behind the haystacks), they can also be crafted if you have the Ebony Smithing perk.
The armor is male only and does not fit wel on the beastly races, but the shield and hammer can be used by any character


Installation instructions:
-Unzip the files and paste them into your skyrim\data folder (usually located at: C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data ).
-Launch skyrim and under data files enable BramKnolsDespairArmors1.esp.



Models and textures included are hand made and hand painted by me, Don't use them for other mods without my permission.
